resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again later
Application server could not respond. Please try later
Please check your internet connection or try again later.
We\'re sorry, this video is too large. Please compress it or choose another.
This device is rooted. We are not responsible for any kind of data loss and hack. Use it at your own risk!!
Allow us to access\nyour camera roll
This will let you upload existing photos and videos that are stored on your phone.
If you don\'t enable access to storage, you won\'t be able to upload photos and videos.
To take photos and videos for use in the app, you need to allow access to your camera.
If you don\'t enable access to camera & storage, you won\'t be able to take photos and videos.
